sentences.en: A method of textural feature extraction from mammogram based on GLCM is proposed in this paper.
sentences.cn: 文中提出了基于灰度共生矩阵的乳腺X照片纹理特征提取方法.

sentences.en: High solid ferments and yeast lees contract to highlight textural qualities.
sentences.cn: 采用固体发和酵母分离技术提高酒的品质.

sentences.en: Textural factors include hand feel and mouth feel of firmness, softness, juiciness , chewiness, grittiness.
sentences.cn: 质构要素包括手感和口感所体验到的坚硬度 、 柔软度 、 多汁度 、 咀嚼性 、 砂砾度等.

sentences.en: Textural surfaces range from smooth to rough; so a careful balance is needed in a room.
sentences.cn: 质感表面从光滑到粗糙有许多层次, 所以在房间内需要精心安排以求均衡.

sentences.en: The design strategy embraces textural contrast and celebrates the dissonance of eclectic elements to create a truly memorable patron experience.
sentences.cn: 设计策略包括结构设计对比以及折中元素对比，建立一个真正令人难忘的顾客体验。

sentences.en: The expressions of abstract decorative designs include extreme rational, accidental or textural techniques.
sentences.cn: 抽象装饰图案的表现形式可以是高度理性化的, 偶发性的,也可以是肌理的.

sentences.en: The results indicated that adding order of K could affect the textural properties very slight.
sentences.cn: 结果表明,K的加入顺序对催化剂的织构性质影响很小.

sentences.en: the textural characteristics of the rocks
This is due to the fact that the book has too obvious and lacks textural research.
sentences.cn: 《博议》之受冷遇,或与其应世性质太过明显、缺乏考辩钩沉有关.
